title: Eric Clapton - Crossroads 4-CD Edition 1988 [FLAC+MP3]
description:
Source: Polydor 835 261-2 Box Set 4-CD 1988 + Fresh Cover Art Scans


The CD covers are labelled Disc 1, Disc 2, etc so each CD cover was scanned an d applied to the correct CD rip. These covers are a light blue so other than slight contrast change the covers are true to the actual color.

Tags have been edited so Discs 1-4 show up under 1 Album in player view.

- Big Papi

Credits: <a href="
http://image.bayimg.com/12b384dae5c24cd9e0d47a0e1eb86cbc19fb2657.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://image.bayimg.com/12b384dae5c24cd9e0d47a0e1eb86cbc19fb2657.jpg</a>
